attributes.action: Prioritise council housing allocations to favour the indigenous population
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more the indigenous population is discriminated against and this is no more true than in allocation of council housing.  It is far easier for refugees to gain the necessary points to be given such allocation than it is for our own.  This should change and the apparent positive discrimination in favour of refugees and economic migrants should cease.  We need to look after our own first

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
